Description: This auction is for a 2008, Gibson, Les Paul Studio, Robot Electric Guitar and Case, Blue (Blueburst) finish with Tronical Tune system. The Master Control Knob is not working and comes off. The pot may be bad or may be fine, I don’t know. Unsure of the Robotics. Includes charger with power supply, Robot not checked or tested. Works fine the old-fashion way. The guitar weighs 8 pounds.
